title: Tandoori mixed grill
description: Lamb cutlets, chicken thighs and king prawns are cooked in a traditional tandoori marinade, with a dill fusion version for the salmon.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
6 chicken thigh fillets, skinned, flattened out and slashed
12 large raw king prawns, shelled, tail tip left on, deveined
small bunch fresh dill, very finely chopped
2 tbsp drained capers, very finely chopped
